title: public
description: The static/ directory is directly served at server root and contains public files that have to keep their names (e.g. robots.txt) or likely won't change (e.g. favicon.ico).

title: public
head.title: Public directory

# Public directory

The `static/` directory is directly served at server root and contains public files that have to keep their names (e.g. `robots.txt`) _or_ likely won't change (e.g. `favicon.ico`).
